entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:12 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:12 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
